column5: Would this be for a repaint or a repair?
Repair.. thanks Roy The pull cord snapped on me last weekend out on the lake.. Just gotta get a new one installed

Go to the pharmacy, get a pair of blue latex gloves so you don't get your pinkies dirty, next, get the appropriate length and diameter cord.  Get out the tools and get busy doing a mans job, tinker with the recoil and probably save $100.
Pickering marine, at Bayly and Brock, north side, Merc, dealer, does a good job there.
I was going to say the same. I personally havnt been there, but drive past it all the time
Come over and I'll give you 30 bucks .. I didn't ask how to fix it i asked where I can fix it. But thank for the input...
